name: Gila Monster
description: One of only two poisonous lizards in the world!
funFact: Their bright colors warn predators to stay away!

name: Cobra
description: Hood-flaring snake that can stand up tall!
funFact: Some cobras can spit venom up to 6 feet away!

name: Lizard
funFact: Many lizards can detach their tails to escape predators!

name: Alligator
description: Big armored swimmers with powerful jaws!
funFact: Baby alligators make squeaky sounds like dog toys!

name: Komodo Dragon
description: Giant lizards as long as a car!
funFact: They can smell food from 5 miles away!

name: Turtle
funFact: A turtle's shell is part of its skeleton!

name: Chameleon
funFact: Their tongues are longer than their bodies!
